trans-unit.source: Controls how a document is printed, when printing from a Windows Forms application.
trans-unit.target: Controlla la modalità di stampa un documento, durante la stampa da un'applicazione Windows Form.

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, PrintController controls how a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> is printed.
trans-unit.target: Quando viene implementato in una classe derivata, PrintController controlli come un <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>viene stampato.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.Print%2A?displayProperty=fullName> invokes the print controller's <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A>, and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A> methods, which in turn tell the printer how to print the document.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.Print%2A?displayProperty=fullName>richiama il controller di stampa <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A>, e <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A>metodi, che a sua volta informazioni della stampante stampare il documento.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A></xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.Print%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Print preview uses a specialized PrintController.
trans-unit.target: Anteprima di stampa utilizza PrintController specializzato.

trans-unit.source: For an example of a print controller that is specialized for print preview, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController>.
trans-unit.target: Per un esempio di un controller di stampa specializzato per l'anteprima di stampa, vedere la <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController>.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController>

trans-unit.source: PrintController is used by <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>, and not typically used directly.
trans-unit.target: PrintController viene utilizzato da <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>e in genere non viene utilizzato direttamente.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework includes three print controllers that are derived from PrintController that help accomplish common tasks.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework include tre controller di stampa che derivano da PrintController che consentono di eseguire attività comuni.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController> prints a document to a printer.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController>Stampa un documento a una stampante.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController> generates a preview of what the document will look like when printed and is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewDialog> classes.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController>genera un'anteprima dell'aspetto del documento stampato e viene utilizzato il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewDialog>classi.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewDialog> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog> provides a printing status dialog during the printing process.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog>fornisce una finestra di dialogo di stato durante il processo di stampa.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog>

trans-unit.source: For more information about printing with Windows Forms, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing> namespace overview.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulla stampa con Windows Form, vedere il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing>Panoramica dello spazio dei nomi.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing>

trans-unit.source: If you wish to print from a Windows Presentation Foundation application, see the <xref:System.Printing> namespace.
trans-unit.target: Se si desidera stampare da un'applicazione Windows Presentation Foundation, vedere il <xref:System.Printing>spazio dei nomi.</xref:System.Printing>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController"></xref> is used for print preview.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se il <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController"> </xref> viene utilizzato per l'anteprima di stampa.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>in tutti i casi.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, completes the control sequence that determines when and how to print a page of a document.
trans-unit.target: Quando sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, completa la sequenza di controllo che determina quando e come stampare una pagina di un documento.

trans-unit.source: OnEndPage is called immediately after the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event.
trans-unit.target: OnEndPage viene chiamato immediatamente dopo il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>Genera il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>evento.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: If an exception is thrown inside a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event of a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>, OnEndPage is not called.
trans-unit.target: Se viene generata un'eccezione all'interno di un <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>evento di un <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>, non viene chiamato OnEndPage.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> that is sent to the printer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>Crea il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>che viene inviato alla stampante.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics></xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Dopo aver <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>viene chiamato, il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A>metodo imposta la <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>su un'immagine di una singola pagina.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: (Use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A> method to set how to print a page in a document.
trans-unit.target: (Utilizzare il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A>metodo per impostare la modalità stampare una pagina in un documento.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can adjust page settings separately for each page.) The OnEndPage method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, while the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, è possibile modificare le impostazioni di pagina separatamente per ogni pagina.) Cancella il metodo OnEndPage di <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, mentre il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A>metodo la deallocazione.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref> that represents the document currently being printed.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref> che rappresenta il documento in fase di stampa.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs"> </xref> che contiene i dati dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, completes the control sequence that determines when and how to print a document.
trans-unit.target: Quando sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, completa la sequenza di controllo che determina quando e come stampare un documento.

trans-unit.source: OnEndPrint is called immediately after the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.EndPrint> event.
trans-unit.target: OnEndPrint viene chiamato immediatamente dopo il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>Genera il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.EndPrint>evento.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.EndPrint> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> that is sent to the printer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>Crea il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>che viene inviato alla stampante.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics></xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Dopo aver <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>viene chiamato, il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A>metodo imposta la <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>su un'immagine di una singola pagina.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: (Use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> method to determine when and how to print a document.
trans-unit.target: (Utilizzare il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>metodo per determinare quando e come stampare un documento.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can delay printing for 30 minutes or adjust the printer settings for the document.) The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, while the OnEndPrint method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, è possibile ritardare la stampa di 30 minuti o modificare le impostazioni della stampante per il documento.) Il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A>metodo cancella il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, mentre il metodo OnEndPrint la deallocazione.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref> that represents the document currently being printed.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref> che rappresenta il documento in fase di stampa.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs"> </xref> che contiene i dati dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, begins the control sequence that determines when and how to print a page of a document.
trans-unit.target: Quando sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, inizia la sequenza di controllo che determina quando e come stampare una pagina di un documento.

trans-unit.source: OnStartPage is called immediately before the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event.
trans-unit.target: OnStartPage viene chiamato immediatamente prima di <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>Genera il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>evento.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> that is sent to the printer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>Crea il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>che viene inviato alla stampante.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics></xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, the OnStartPage method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Dopo aver <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>viene chiamato il metodo imposta OnStartPage il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>su un'immagine di una singola pagina.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, while the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A>metodo cancella il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, mentre il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A>metodo la deallocazione.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the OnStartPage method to set how to print a page in a document.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il metodo OnStartPage per impostare la modalità stampare una pagina in un documento.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can adjust page settings separately for each page.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, è possibile regolare le impostazioni di pagina separatamente per ogni pagina.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref> that represents the document currently being printed.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref> che rappresenta il documento in fase di stampa.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs"> </xref> che contiene i dati dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> that represents a page from a <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> che rappresenta una pagina da un <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, begins the control sequence that determines when and how to print a document.
trans-unit.target: Quando sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, inizia la sequenza di controllo che determina quando e come stampare un documento.

trans-unit.source: OnStartPrint is called immediately after the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.BeginPrint> event.
trans-unit.target: OnStartPrint viene chiamato immediatamente dopo il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>Genera il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.BeginPrint>evento.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.BeginPrint> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: Use the OnStartPrint method to determine when and how to print a document.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il metodo OnStartPrint per determinare quando e come stampare un documento.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can delay printing for 30 minutes or adjust the printer settings for the document.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, è possibile ritardare la stampa di 30 minuti o modificare le impostazioni della stampante per il documento.

trans-unit.source: OnStartPrint creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> that is sent to the printer.
trans-unit.target: Crea OnStartPrint il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>che viene inviato alla stampante.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: After OnStartPrint is called, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to one of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Dopo la chiamata OnStartPrint, il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A>metodo imposta il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>a uno di una singola pagina.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, while the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A>metodo cancella il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, mentre il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A>metodo la deallocazione.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: The OnStartPrint method is a good place to verify that <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings> are valid.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo OnStartPrint è un ottimo strumento per verificare che <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings>sono validi.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref> that represents the document currently being printed.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref> che rappresenta il documento in fase di stampa.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs"> </xref> che contiene i dati dell'evento.
